name: Test Pilot
description:
Randomly build a plane, then try to fly it. Aim for high scores in various air stunts.

This game was made for the TIGSource Procedural Generation competition in May 2008.

Instructions are in-game. If you're having trouble taking off, hold right until you're at maximum throttle, then gradually tap down to provide some lift. Also, some planes simple don't fly, so try another.
